Barack Obama said Egypt is making progress toward a solution to the political crisis enveloping the country and preparing for free elections to replace Hosni Mubarak . Obviously, Egypt has to negotiate a path, and I think they're making progress. Barack Obama told reporters. Barack Obama did not elaborate, but his comments echoed those of Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton , who over the weekend threw U.S. support behind the Suleiman-led transition process and urged the international community to

Mike Pence into the 2012 presidential race is under way, with a veteran of the Ronald Reagan White House launching a petition drive on Monday urging him to enter the primary contests,'' the AP writes. Ralph Benko, a deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan , announced the America's Barack Obama Committee to encourage a Pence-for-president bid. Bill Clinton Michele Bachmann Jim Ryan, R-Kan., is also helping the campaign to collect signatures from conservatives and tea party activists. ROMNEY: A new McClatchy Newspapers-Marist poll shows Barack Obama leading Mitt Romney in a hypothetical matchup, 51-38.`` In their December survey, Mitt Romney was leading Barack Obama 46-44 percent,'' CNN writes. spoke

`` David Letterman is going to come, he promised. I want to get a couple of famous people up here, her friends especially, some people like Betty White , Nancy Reagan .'' He explained: My wife will stay in her bedroom, she'll have her hair done nicely and make up so people can go singularly into the bedroom and talk to her. Maybe she understands them or not and maybe she cheers up. There are other mobile ecosystems. We will disrupt them. There will be challenges. We will overcome them. Success requires speed. We will be swift, Stephen Elop and Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer said in a boldly worded open letter.`` Together, we see the opportunity, and we have the will, the resources and the drive to succeed.'' I totally disagree with[ Bill Lockyer ],'' Fritz said, adding that a bankruptcy law would get some serious negotiations going with the labor unions, where they know that this is an option, and they know that if they push it, it could be used to walk away from the liability. Fritz warned that bankruptcy should only be used as a last resort, in the event that unions refuse to come to the table like the private sector.`` We've had that with GM

her`` brand'' with fans. England footballer Ashley, Cheryl Cole , 27, had continued to travel and book hotels under her maiden name. Last night a source close to the X Factor host said: Cheryl Cole considered going back to her maiden name but now she has dismissed the idea. People knew who she was as a Cheryl Cole but she has only become truly famous as Cheryl Cole . yet but seeds have been sown by people like Black Eyed Peas singer Will.i.am and it is important she creates a lasting brand. It would be madness to change back. The Sunday Mirror can also confirm that Simon Cowell has promised her a job as a judge on the US X Factor. He has spent the past few days convincing American producers that she will be a huge success.
